text: Sarah Lawrence College is a private liberal arts college in Yonkers, New York. It is famous for its rigorous academic standards and its emphasize on individual study.The College Buzz Book, eds. Carolyn C. Wise, Stephanie Hauser, Vault Editors (New York: Vault, 2007), p. 560 Notable alumni include Rahm Emanuel, Vera Wang and J. J. Abrams. The school enrolls 1473 undergraduates and nearly 330 graduate students. It competes in Skyline Conference with 15 varsity sports. == References == Category:Schools in New York (state) Category:Yonkers, New York Category:1926 establishments in the United States
title: Sarah Lawrence College
